text: Hisham Al-Otaibi (1946 - 4 January 2017) was a Kuwaiti politician. He served as the Minister of Finance and Industry from 1998 to 1999. He got a Bachelor of Science in engineering from the University of Oklahoma. Al-Otaibi died on 4 January 2017 at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Asian politicians Category:Engineers Category:Kuwaiti people
title: Hisham Al-Otaibi
